title: <0>Appflowy</0> Blocks
description: AppFlowy is not only an open-source alternative to Notion but an application infra provider as well. We publish reliable and customizable standalone building blocks such as AppFlowy Editor and Kanban Board for developers to build their own applications.

editor.title: AppFlowy Editor
editor.description: A highly customizable rich-text editor for Flutter

board.title: AppFlowy Board
board.description: A customizable and draggable Kanban Board widget
